T02D3106:194a-1: a'arya ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa
T02D3106:194a-2: tre n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi ta mandal bi
T02D3106:194a-3: dhi n'a ma / bod skad du /
T02D3106:194a-4: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
T02D3106:194a-5: ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma
T02D3106:194a-6: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya
T02D3106:194b-0: ba / 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la @194b phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3106:194b-1: 'jigs pa brgyad la sogs pa las thar zhing //
T02D3106:194b-2: rang gi don las gzhan 'dod gtsor mdzad pa'i //
T02D3106:194b-3: bla ma sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3106:194b-4: dkyil 'khor cho ga phyi yi don ltar brtsam //
T02D3106:194b-5: de la dang por bla ma ni //
T02D3106:194b-6: chos bcu la sogs ldan pa la//
T02D3106:194b-7: slob ma dad ldan lha la gus //
T02D3106:194b-8: rigs ldan de yis gsol gsum gdab //
T02D3106:194b-9: de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D3106:194b-10: rdzas dang yo byad tshogs ba bri //
T02D3106:194b-11: tshogs nas bsnyen pa la 'jug bya //
T02D3106:194b-12: gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' ba //
T02D3106:194b-13: mandal chag chag mchod sogs dgram //
T02D3106:194b-14: byang chub sems bskyed ldan pa yis //
T02D3106:194b-15: bdun po rnam dag sngon 'gro bas //
T02D3106:194b-16: rang nyid lha mo'i 'khor lor bsam //
T02D3106:194b-17: nang gi dkyil 'khor cho ga las //
T02D3106:194b-18: ji ltar 'byung bo bskyed par bya //
T02D3106:194b-19: de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa ni //
T02D3106:194b-20: rang gi snying gar rab bkod la //
T02D3106:194b-21: snying po 'bum du phrin las bzhi //
T02D3106:194b-22: ji ltar rigs pas bzlas par bya //
T02D3106:194b-23: yang na dus dang mtshan ma dang //
T02D3106:194b-24: nus ldan rigs pas sbyar bar bya //
T02D3106:194b-26: de ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3106:194b-27: de ni sa cho ga bya ba la //
T02D3106:194b-28: dang por phyi dang nang dang ni //
T02D3106:194b-29: phyogs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang //
T02D3106:194b-30: 'byung khungs la sogs rigs kyis brtag / de nas 'jig rten rgyal po'am //
T02D3106:194b-31: blon po bdag po ci rigs par //
T02D3106:194b-32: mngon pa bdag po tshig gis blang //
T02D3106:194b-33: mi mngon par gyur sa gzhi ni //
T02D3106:194b-34: lha dang sa yi lha mo la //
T02D3106:194b-35: blangs te rmi lam la sogs pas ;
T02D3106:194b-36: / brtag pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02D3106:194b-37: sa bdag la ni mi gnod par //
T02D3106:194b-38: rim pas brkos la nyes pa bsal //
T02D3106:194b-39: rnam lnga dang bsres 'thas par bcag / yang na 'jig rten gsum 'dul gyi //
T02D3106:194b-40: sngags sam las kyi bum pa'i chus //
T02D3106:194b-41: nyes pa ma lus dag par bya //
T02D3106:194b-42: yang na lha mo'i rang sngags kyis //
T02D3106:194b-43: dag par byas pas gdon dang ni //
T02D3106:194b-44: zug rdu'i nyes pa dag par bya //
T02D3106:194b-45: yang na 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang //
T02D3106:194b-46: rang gi sngags kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D3106:194b-47: raksha'i sngags sam rang nyid ni //
T02D3106:194b-48: 'phags mar byas te gsol ba gdab //
T02D3106:194b-49: de nas cho ga rim pa yis//
T02D3106:195a-0: @195a * // bskyed la phyogs bzhir slob ma yang //
T02D3106:195a-1: lha mo bzhi yi bskyed rim gyis //
T02D3106:195a-2: tshig ni 'di skad gsol ba gdab //
T02D3106:195a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D3106:195a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D3106:195a-5: chos kun mchog la yang dag byung //
T02D3106:195a-8: yang na tshigs bcad brjod par bya //
T02D3106:195a-9: de nas bla mas 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la rang nyid khros pa'i gzugs /
T02D3106:195a-10: mam tam las ni mig nyi zla //
T02D3106:195a-11: h'um las rkang ba rdo rjer bya //
T02D3106:195a-12: 'gying bcas rdo rje gsor ba ni //
T02D3106:195a-13: gar gyi tshul gyis 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:195a-14: lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi //
T02D3106:195a-15: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun nyon cig / nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D3106:195a-16: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02D3106:195a-18: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus kyis ni //
T02D3106:195a-19: lus gsum las gsum dag byas te //
T02D3106:195a-20: 'di ni de gzhom gzhan du min //
T02D3106:195a-22: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D3106:195a-24: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02D3106:195a-26: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha rod a'adzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya w'aktsi tta h'um phat /
T02D3106:195a-28: bgegs med bya phyir bgegs dgra ni //
T02D3106:195a-29: phur bu'i gzugs kyis gdab par bya //
T02D3106:195a-30: de nas lha yi tshogs dang ni //
T02D3106:195a-31: gtor ma mchod pas tshim bya ste //
T02D3106:195a-32: rab bsrung gnas su bsrung bar bya //
T02D3106:195a-33: de nas sa la lag pa ni //
T02D3106:195a-34: lan gsum brdabs pas lha mo ni //
T02D3106:195a-35: lang tsho ldan pas bsams te ni //
T02D3106:195a-36: byin brlabs ye shes gzhug pa dang ;
T02D3106:195a-37: / mchod bstod byas la 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:195a-38: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3106:195a-39: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D3106:195a-40: sa dang phar phyin lam la ni //
T02D3106:195a-41: lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur te //
T02D3106:195a-42: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D3106:195a-43: ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar //
T02D3106:195a-44: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi stobs //
T02D3106:195a-45: pham par bya ste dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D3106:195a-46: lha mos gsol te thim par bsam //
T02D3106:195a-47: de nas dri yi thig le dang //
T02D3106:195a-48: mchod pa la sogs rgyas par bya //
T02D3106:195a-49: de rjes bum pa rnam pa drug / gser dngul rin chen las byas pa'am //
T02D3106:195a-50: sa las byas pa mgrin phra ba'o //
T02D3106:195b-0: lto ba che la @195b nag po yi //
T02D3106:195b-1: ra ri med pa'i ras kyis ni //
T02D3106:195b-2: kha brgyan mtshan ma legs bris te //
T02D3106:195b-3: 'bru dang rin chen sman lnga dang //
T02D3106:195b-4: ldan par byas te me 'od dam //
T02D3106:195b-5: dri yi thig le'i steng du gzhag //
T02D3106:195b-6: de nas slob ma rgyan dang ni //
T02D3106:195b-7: kha dog ldan pa'i rigs bzang dang //
T02D3106:195b-8: bde gshegs gsang sngags bsgrub brtson pa //
T02D3106:195b-9: don ston de la sdom pa dbog / dge bsnyen dge tshul la sogs pa //
T02D3106:195b-10: rim pas byang chub sems bskyed bya //
T02D3106:195b-11: de nas sngags kyi sdom pa yang //
T02D3106:195b-12: sbyin pas dang por 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:195b-14: 'khor ni bzhi char la yang gnang ;
T02D3106:195b-15: / rang rang slob dang ldan pa la //
T02D3106:195b-16: theg pa chen por sgrub byed pa //
T02D3106:195b-17: kha cig gsang sngags grub don gnyer //
T02D3106:195b-19: de las gzhan yang bsod nams 'dod //
T02D3106:195b-20: gzhan dag pha rol don du gnyer //
T02D3106:195b-21: 'jig rten phyi ma mchod bya ste //
T02D3106:195b-22: dad pa mang du byas nas ni //
T02D3106:195b-25: tshe 'di tsam ni don gnyer ba //
T02D3106:195b-26: 'jig rten pha rol pa de min //
T02D3106:195b-27: skyes bu 'jig rten pha rol gnyer //
T02D3106:195b-29: zhes pas bla mas spro ba bskyed //
T02D3106:195b-30: rang gi lus la legs bcug ste //
T02D3106:195b-31: rang gi snang ba las byung ba //
T02D3106:195b-32: ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gzhug / lan gsum bar du sbyang bar bya //
T02D3106:195b-33: de nas slob mas bla ma la //
T02D3106:195b-34: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D3106:195b-35: dga' chen khyod ni ston pa po //
T02D3106:195b-36: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D3106:195b-37: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D3106:195b-38: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:195b-39: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:195b-40: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D3106:195b-41: skyabs gsum po yang bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:195b-42: thar pa chen po'i tshul mchog tu //
T02D3106:195b-43: mgon po bdag ni gzhug bar mdzod ;
T02D3106:195b-44: / ces pa lan gsum gsol ba gdab //
T02D3106:195b-45: de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:195b-46: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D3106:195b-47: gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D3106:195b-48: khyod ni bstan pa'i snod yin no //
T02D3106:195b-49: khyod ni yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D3106:195b-50: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3106:196a-2: rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni //
T02D3106:196a-3: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02D3106:196a-4: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D3106:196a-5: sh'akya seng sogs cho ga yis //
T02D3106:196a-6: bdud kyi sde ni drag po yang //
T02D3106:196a-7: dpung chen ma lus bcom pa ste //
T02D3106:196a-10: de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas //
T02D3106:196a-11: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces pa
T02D3106:196a-12: lan gsum yang na gcig / brjod la yan lag
T02D3106:196a-13: bdun pa rdzogs // byas te byang chub sems bskyad bya //
T02D3106:196a-14: de yi cho ga las byung ba //
T02D3106:196a-15: shes par bya ste sbyin par bya //
T02D3106:196a-16: de nas h'um a'a: aom gyis ni //
T02D3106:196a-17: rdo rje dang ldan thig les mchod //
T02D3106:196a-18: de nas rigs kyi sdom pa dang //
T02D3106:196a-19: bla ma sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3106:196a-20: lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang //
T02D3106:196a-22: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02D3106:196a-23: dus 'di nas nyid bzung nas su //
T02D3106:196a-24: byang chub snying po la gnas par //
T02D3106:196a-25: sems can ma lus pa yin no //
T02D3106:196a-26: rdzogs par bya phyir sems bskyed bya //
T02D3106:196a-27: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D3106:196a-28: byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa //
T02D3106:196a-29: tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa dang //
T02D3106:196a-30: dge ba'i chos ni spud pa dang //
T02D3106:196a-31: sems can don byed tshul khrims dang //
T02D3106:196a-32: so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya //
T02D3106:196a-33: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D3106:196a-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
T02D3106:196a-35: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D3106:196a-36: de ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D3106:196a-37: dam tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D3106:196a-38: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D3106:196a-39: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D3106:196a-40: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3106:196a-41: slob dpon bdag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3106:196a-42: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D3106:196a-43: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D3106:196a-44: nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu //
T02D3106:196a-45: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D3106:196a-46: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D3106:196a-47: padma'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D3106:196a-48: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D3106:196a-49: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung //
T02D3106:196a-50: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D3106:196a-51: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D3106:196a-52: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi//
T02D3106:196b-0: @196b mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D3106:196b-1: tshul khrims bslab pa la sogs dang //
T02D3106:196b-2: gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang //
T02D3106:196b-3: rang gi dam tshig bsrub par bgyi //
T02D3106:196b-4: bdag gi bya ba'i las rnams kyi //
T02D3106:196b-5: sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub bya ste //
T02D3106:196b-6: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D3106:196b-7: ma bsgal ba rnams bsgral bar bya //
T02D3106:196b-8: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya //
T02D3106:196b-9: dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbyung bgyi //
T02D3106:196b-10: thams cad bla med byang chub kyi //
T02D3106:196b-11: lam la myur du gnas par bya'o //
T02D3106:196b-12: lan gsum du ni zlos su gzhub //
T02D3106:196b-13: de nas byung bsal sdig pa dbyung //
T02D3106:196b-14: me tog phul te sngags kyis ni //
T02D3106:196b-15: brtan par byas te las kyi sngags //
T02D3106:196b-16: rgyal la sogs pas brjod par bya'o //
T02D3106:196b-17: so shing aa shvadtha dang ni //
T02D3106:196b-18: au dumw'a ra sogs mi 'khyod cing //
T02D3106:196b-19: srin dang gas chag mi sdug med //
T02D3106:196b-20: sor bcu gnyis pa mthe'u chung tshang //
T02D3106:196b-21: me tog ldan pa 'char bcug ste //
T02D3106:196b-22: byang shar bltas te mi smra bar ;
T02D3106:196b-24: ltos med rang gi mdun drang bor //
T02D3106:196b-25: de yi rtse mo bdag dang nye //
T02D3106:196b-26: bltas na mchog gi dngos grub yin //
T02D3106:196b-27: phyogs dang mtshams su kha bltas na //
T02D3106:196b-30: dkyil 'khor phyir ni dngos grub med //
T02D3106:196b-31: de nas dri yi chu ni bzang //
T02D3106:196b-32: blugs te skyor chu blud par bya //
T02D3106:196b-33: aom hri: bi shuddha: sarba p'a pam ni tsa sam
T02D3106:196b-34: sho dha ya bi kalpa aa ba na ya h'um
T02D3106:196b-35: zhes lan gsum brjod la 'thung du gzhug / ngag
T02D3106:196b-37: skud pa dmar po sum bsgril ba //
T02D3106:196b-38: mdung pa gsum ldan rang lhar byas //
T02D3106:196b-39: sngags kyis btab la lag par bcing //
T02D3106:196b-40: h'um las byung ba'i ku sha yang //
T02D3106:196b-41: sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya //
T02D3106:196b-42: de nas mchod pa spro bas chos //
T02D3106:196b-43: legs par bshad par bya ba ste //
T02D3106:196b-44: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen pa //
T02D3106:196b-45: au dumw'a ra'i me tog ltar //
T02D3106:196b-46: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02D3106:196b-47: sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D3106:196b-48: de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka' //
T02D3106:196b-49: gang gis mnyam med sems can don //
T02D3106:196b-50: bla na med par byed nus pa //
T02D3106:196b-51: gnyis med zab mo'i spyod yul ni //
T02D3106:197a-2: dang po bskal pa grangs med nas //
T02D3106:197a-3: bsags pa'i sdig pa gang dang gang //
T02D3106:197a-5: de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur //
T02D3106:197a-6: zhes pas kun la spro ba bskyed //
T02D3106:197a-7: slob ma de rnams kun gyis kyang //
T02D3106:197a-8: seng ge'i nyal thabs ldan pas su //
T02D3106:197a-9: ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya //
T02D3106:197a-10: nang par langs la skal ldan rnams //
T02D3106:197a-11: thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D3106:197a-12: grong khyer dam pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D3106:197a-13: nang par dus su langs nas ni //
T02D3106:197a-14: rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya //
T02D3106:197a-15: des kyang bzang ngan mthong ba rnams //
T02D3106:197a-16: bla ma'i mdun du brjod par bya //
T02D3106:197a-17: mtshan ma bzang bas dngos grub 'grub //
T02D3106:197a-18: ngan pa bsrung ba me yi ni //
T02D3106:197a-19: las kyis sdig pa gzhom par bya //
T02D3106:197a-20: de yi cho ga sbyin sreg bzhin //
T02D3106:197a-21: de nas nam mkhar bzhugs pa yi //
T02D3106:197a-22: dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod bstims la //
T02D3106:197a-23: mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya //
T02D3106:197a-24: pus mo g-yas pa sar btsugs te //
T02D3106:197a-25: lag tu bdug pa'i spos thogs te //
T02D3106:197a-26: 'phags ma gdugs dkar lha mo mchog / rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3106:197a-27: thugs rje'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D3106:197a-28: mgon po bri bar 'tshal lags na //
T02D3106:197a-29: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D3106:197a-30: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D3106:197a-31: bcom ldan 'das mar bdag ni gus //
T02D3106:197a-32: de ni bka' drin mdzad par rigs //
T02D3106:197a-34: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D3106:197a-35: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02D3106:197a-36: gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02D3106:197a-37: 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang //
T02D3106:197a-38: 'byung po byang chub nyer gnas pa //
T02D3106:197a-39: gang dag rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02D3106:197a-40: bstan la mngon par dga' ba kun //
T02D3106:197a-41: bdag ni rdo rje che ge ste //
T02D3106:197a-43: ji ltar nus pa'i yo byad kyis //
T02D3106:197a-45: thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas su //
T02D3106:197a-46: deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D3106:197a-47: dkyil 'khor lhan cig gyur pa kun //
T02D3106:197a-48: nye ba ru ni mdzad par rigs //
T02D3106:197a-49: lan gsum la sogs brjod par bya //
T02D3106:197a-50: slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang ldan pas //
T02D3106:197b-0: rnal 'byor @197b rdzogs pas sngar langs te //
T02D3106:197b-2: dkyil 'khor bteg la thig las bya //
T02D3106:197b-3: ras bal la sogs nyes med la //
T02D3106:197b-4: tshon lngas legs bsgyur rin chen snod //
T02D3106:197b-5: rigs lnga'i sa bon las bskyed de //
T02D3106:197b-6: byin rlabs dbang rnams rdzogs par bya'o ;
T02D3106:197b-7: / aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a:
T02D3106:197b-8: par spa ra aa nu ga te sarba dharm'a: aa
T02D3106:197b-9: tya na ta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: zhes
T02D3106:197b-10: brjod lnga po gcig tu bsgril //
T02D3106:197b-11: tshad ni nyis 'gyur la sogs bya //
T02D3106:197b-12: de nas dri bzangs kyis spags te //
T02D3106:197b-13: ye shes thig ni mkhas pas gdab //
T02D3106:197b-14: bla mas slob ma dza yis sbyin ;
T02D3106:197b-15: / de nyid sum 'gyur gyis blangs te //
T02D3106:197b-16: thig sgras sems can don du ni //
T02D3106:197b-17: sangs rgyas mang po bskul bsam bya //
T02D3106:197b-18: bla ma nub ste shar bltas nas //
T02D3106:197b-19: slob ma nub bltas tshangs thig gdab //
T02D3106:197b-20: de ltar g-yas skor gnyis btab la //
T02D3106:197b-21: zur dang logs sogs thig gi cha ;
T02D3106:197b-22: / bla ma'i man ngag ltar bya'o //
T02D3106:197b-23: phur bu btsugs la bskor bar bya //
T02D3106:197b-24: mtshan min pas ni dngos min 'gyur //
T02D3106:197b-25: thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02D3106:197b-26: lhag dang chad las nad du 'gyur //
T02D3106:197b-28: zur bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi //
T02D3106:197b-29: do shal sogs kyis spras pa ste //
T02D3106:197b-30: sgo khyud rin chen rdo rje dang //
T02D3106:197b-31: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bur bcas //
T02D3106:197b-32: mchod cing bkra shis rdzas kyis brgyan //
T02D3106:197b-33: de ltar mdzes pas lhag chad spang //
T02D3106:197b-34: de nas tshon gyi las bya ba //
T02D3106:197b-36: yang na legs par byas pa yi //
T02D3106:197b-37: kha dog lnga ni rin chen snod //
T02D3106:197b-38: bzhag la rigs lnga'i sa bon snod //
T02D3106:197b-39: bskyed cing bstims la ye shes dgug / gnas gsum brlab cing mchod bstod la //
T02D3106:197b-40: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D3106:197b-41: zhes sogs brgya la sogs pa bzlas //
T02D3106:197b-42: de nas bla mas dbang ldan la //
T02D3106:197b-43: sogs pa'i mtshams nas g-yas skor du //
T02D3106:197b-44: mdzub re snyoms par drang bar bya //
T02D3106:197b-45: sdo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D3106:197b-46: dkar po nang du rim pas so //
T02D3106:197b-47: mnyam zhing mi yo mchad pa //
T02D3106:197b-48: bris te rin chen snod kyis dgab //
T02D3106:197b-49: me tog dor la slob mas kyang //
T02D3106:197b-50: ci rigs bar ni skyon spangs bri//
T02D3106:198a-0: @198a * // sbom phras nad dang nor zad byed //
T02D3106:198a-1: chad na slob dpon slob ma 'chi //
T02D3106:198a-2: yon pos thams cad kyis sdang 'gyur //
T02D3106:198a-3: shar dkar lho ser nub byang ni //
T02D3106:198a-4: ljang gu'i rnam pa shas che'o //
T02D3106:198a-5: dbus kyi padma'i lte ba la //
T02D3106:198a-6: gdugs dang rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02D3106:198a-7: de yi phyi rim 'khor lo'i cha //
T02D3106:198a-8: dkar por gnas la shar rtsibs la //
T02D3106:198a-9: pad sdong phreng ba'i rnam pa dgod //
T02D3106:198a-10: lhor ni rin chen dbyug pa la //
T02D3106:198a-11: spos snod rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
T02D3106:198a-12: nub tu rdo rje'i rnam pa la //
T02D3106:198a-13: byang du rgya gram dgod par bya //
T02D3106:198a-14: shar dang nub tu skyabs sbyin no //
T02D3106:198a-15: gru chad dmar po la sogs te ;
T02D3106:198a-16: / sgo la lcags kyu la sogs dgod //
T02D3106:198a-17: lha yi snam bu dag la yang //
T02D3106:198a-18: phyogs skyong mtshan ma rim pas so //
T02D3106:198a-19: tshon gyi rim pa rgyas par bya //
T02D3106:198a-20: de nas lha ni mnyes bya dang //
T02D3106:198a-21: slob ma'i sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D3106:198a-22: mgon po'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D3106:198a-23: gzar bu'i tshad dang thab dang rdzas //
T02D3106:198a-24: de rnams gzhan las 'byung bzhin bya'o //
T02D3106:198a-25: de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02D3106:198a-26: lus bkrus dri zhim chus byugs te //
T02D3106:198a-27: rgyan ldan pas ni mchod rdzas thogs //
T02D3106:198a-28: bskor ba byas la slob dpon ni //
T02D3106:198a-29: lha mor byas te h'um sgra yis //
T02D3106:198a-30: rdor dril ldan pas nang zhugs la //
T02D3106:198a-31: dbus nas sgo yi rim pas sku //
T02D3106:198a-32: dbye ba byas te bum pa sogs //
T02D3106:198a-33: rang rang gnas su dgod par bya'o //
T02D3106:198a-34: mchod pa'i tshogs kyang ma lus pas //
T02D3106:198a-35: mdzes byas bla ma dam pa yis //
T02D3106:198a-36: dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed //
T02D3106:198a-37: gzhug dang byin rlabs dbang bskur gsol //
T02D3106:198a-38: byas la mchod bstod ston mo bya //
T02D3106:198a-39: de nas rtsa ba'i lha dang ni //
T02D3106:198a-40: legs ldan la sogs lha rnams la //
T02D3106:198a-41: mthun pa'i gtor ma chen po rnams //
T02D3106:198a-42: cho ga man ngag ldan pas sbyin //
T02D3106:198a-43: de nas slob ma dbang 'dod na //
T02D3106:198a-44: lha las tha dad dbye byas te //
T02D3106:198a-45: slob ma 'jug chul dbang bskur rim //
T02D3106:198a-46: dang po dpa' bos blang bar bya //
T02D3106:198a-47: de nas slob ma rgyan ldan zhing //
T02D3106:198a-48: mdzes ba'i gdong yang dar gyis ni //
T02D3106:198a-49: bkab ste lag par me tog ldan //
T02D3106:198a-50: mkhas pas khrid nas yol ba'i bar //
T02D3106:198a-51: bzhag ste bla mas ku sha yis //
T02D3106:198a-52: bu khyod su yin ci la dga' //
T02D3106:198b-0: dris te bdag ni skal @198b pa bzang //
T02D3106:198b-1: gdugs dkar lha la bdag dga'o //
T02D3106:198b-2: de nas slob mas bla ma la //
T02D3106:198b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D3106:198b-4: slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3106:198b-5: gtso bor lha mor bcas pa yi //
T02D3106:198b-6: lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3106:198b-7: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D3106:198b-8: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D3106:198b-9: de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:198b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D3106:198b-11: lha mo gdugs dkar can gyi gnas //
T02D3106:198b-13: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D3106:198b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la //
T02D3106:198b-15: dad pas phyag ni bya ba ste //
T02D3106:198b-18: na mo na ma h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3106:198b-19: de nas slob ma khrus byas te /
T02D3106:198b-20: shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa la //
T02D3106:198b-21: de nas me tog bcas pa yis //
T02D3106:198b-22: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02D3106:198b-23: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:198b-24: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:198b-25: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3106:198b-26: zhes bya bla mas de la ni //
T02D3106:198b-27: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sogs //
T02D3106:198b-28: gong du bshad pa'i sdom pa sbyin //
T02D3106:198b-29: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi //
T02D3106:198b-30: sems bskyed me tog dang bcas pa //
T02D3106:198b-31: snying gar bzhag ste sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3106:198b-32: aom su ra ste sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham //
T02D3106:198b-33: aom aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste /
T02D3106:198b-34: slob dpon tshig 'di brjod par bya //
T02D3106:198b-35: deng khyod lha mo dang ri khrod pa rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur gyis /
T02D3106:198b-36: ngas gdugs dkar mo'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3106:198b-37: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D3106:198b-38: gdugs dkar can dang ri khrod ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur la /
T02D3106:198b-39: dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos kyi /
T02D3106:198b-40: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du brjod par mi bya ste /
T02D3106:198b-41: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re //
T02D3106:198b-42: de la 'khor lo gzhug bya ste //
T02D3106:198b-43: lag gis rdo rje spyir bzhag nas //
T02D3106:198b-44: 'di ni su yang rung ba la //
T02D3106:198b-45: gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na //
T02D3106:198b-46: khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yis //
T02D3106:198b-48: de nas bdud rtsi chu blugs te //
T02D3106:198b-50: lha mo chen po deng khyod kyi //
T02D3106:198b-51: snying la yang dag di ring zhugs //
T02D3106:199a-2: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D3106:199a-4: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D3106:199a-5: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D3106:199a-6: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D3106:199a-8: aom badzra aud ka tha aom a'a: h'um /
T02D3106:199a-9: deng nas khyod kyi gdugs dkar can nga yin gyis /
T02D3106:199a-10: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D3106:199a-11: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D3106:199a-12: khyod yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas
T02D3106:199a-13: nas sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re
T02D3106:199a-14: zhes brjod do // de nas slob ma'i gtso bo des //
T02D3106:199a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D3106:199a-16: bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la //
T02D3106:199a-17: rdo rje ye shes dbab tu gsol //
T02D3106:199a-18: de nas bla mas slob ma la //
T02D3106:199a-19: lus ngag yid gsum 'byung ba yi //
T02D3106:199a-20: 'khor lor mdoms su yi ge dzhe //
T02D3106:199a-21: dmar ba bsams te 'od zer gyis ;
T02D3106:199a-22: / lus kyi rdul dang mnyam pa yi //
T02D3106:199a-23: sangs rgyas bkug la bstim de ni //
T02D3106:199a-24: aom badzra a'a be sha ya aa aa aa zhes bya'o //
T02D3106:199a-25: yang na a'a be sha ya to sha ya ra
T02D3106:199a-26: ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya h'um
T02D3106:199a-27: ha aa dzhe / zhes brjod 'gying ba dang bcas pas /
T02D3106:199a-28: rdzas kyi bdug pas legs bdugs te //
T02D3106:199a-29: dril bu'i sgra dang aa na le'i //
T02D3106:199a-30: sngags kyang ci mang dag tu bzlas //
T02D3106:199a-31: babs gyur lce la yi ge aa //
T02D3106:199a-32: dmar po bsams te dge mi dge / smros shig bu kun nyams myong zhing //
T02D3106:199a-33: dris la babs pa brtan bya'i phyir //
T02D3106:199a-34: tishtha badzra h'um zhes brtan par bya'o //
T02D3106:199a-35: de nas rdo rjes khrid nas su //
T02D3106:199a-36: shar sgo nas ni 'di skad brjod //
T02D3106:199a-37: 'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bar //
T02D3106:199a-38: rigs kyi rim bzhin 'di yi lha //
T02D3106:199a-39: 'dis ni dngos grub gang yin pa //
T02D3106:199a-40: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
T02D3106:199a-41: de yi bsod nams gang yin las //
T02D3106:199a-43: slob ma'i me tog phreng ba de ;
T02D3106:199a-45: zhes bas me tog lha la ngor //
T02D3106:199a-46: lha ni gang la phog pa dang //
T02D3106:199a-48: pra ti grihna sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la //
T02D3106:199a-49: de nas lag pa nas bzung ste //
T02D3106:199a-50: mig gnyis su ni aom bsams la //
T02D3106:199b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' deng @199b khyod kyis //
T02D3106:199b-1: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D3106:199b-2: phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D3106:199b-3: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D3106:199b-4: aom badzra ni tra aa ba ha ra pa ta lam hr'i: zhes pas gdong g-yogs bkrol nas ni //
T02D3106:199b-6: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D3106:199b-7: khyod ni gdugs dkar rigs su gyur //
T02D3106:199b-8: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
T02D3106:199b-9: 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs pa kun //
T02D3106:199b-10: dngos grub kun khyod dngos su 'gyur //
T02D3106:199b-11: dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang //
T02D3106:199b-12: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D3106:199b-13: de nas me tog lhung ba'i lha //
T02D3106:199b-14: bstan dang lha gzhan thams cad dang //
T02D3106:199b-15: dkyil 'khor de nyid rdzogs par bstan //
T02D3106:199b-16: de nas slob ma dang ldan pas //
T02D3106:199b-17: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te //
T02D3106:199b-18: yon dbul dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
T02D3106:199b-19: gdugs dkar can gyi dbang bskur ba //
T02D3106:199b-20: 'gro ba skyob phyir rdo rje can //
T02D3106:199b-21: de ltar yon tan kun 'byung ba //
T02D3106:199b-22: de bzhin bdag la deng stsol cig / ces pa byas te dbang sbyin phyir //
T02D3106:199b-23: yungs kar sngags kyis bgegs bzlog la //
T02D3106:199b-24: khrus byas rgyan ldan shar sgo yi //
T02D3106:199b-25: khri la 'dug la me tog ni //
T02D3106:199b-26: sngags kyis lha la dbul bar bya //
T02D3106:199b-28: blangs te mgor bcings sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3106:199b-29: aom dharma kunda aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D3106:199b-30: me tog phreng ba'i dbang 'di yis //
T02D3106:199b-31: 'dod lha'i dngos grub myur rdzogs te //
T02D3106:199b-32: padma can gyi zhing sogs su //
T02D3106:199b-33: sangs rgyas nyid dang mnyam par shog / rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas //
T02D3106:199b-34: las kyi bum par chu bsdus te //
T02D3106:199b-35: slob ma mi bskyod par byas la //
T02D3106:199b-36: glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang ni //
T02D3106:199b-37: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis chu blugs shing //
T02D3106:199b-39: lha mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02D3106:199b-40: bag chags thams cad dag byed pa //
T02D3106:199b-41: chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis //
T02D3106:199b-42: nyon mongs thams cad dag gyur cig / lugs 'byung bris pa'i dbu rgyan la //
T02D3106:199b-43: rin chen 'byung ldan bcug nas ni //
T02D3106:199b-44: bskon la dar dbyangs kyis bcings la /
T02D3106:199b-45: aom patta badzra aa ralli ho /
T02D3106:199b-46: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa //
T02D3106:199b-47: bde gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa dang //
T02D3106:199b-48: rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang //
T02D3106:200a-1: dpyangs dbu rgyan dbang bskur ro //
T02D3106:200a-2: gser sogs tshad ldan rdo rje la //
T02D3106:200a-3: snang ba mtha' yas bkug bstims te //
T02D3106:200a-4: slob ma'i lag gtad sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3106:200a-5: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi //
T02D3106:200a-6: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D3106:200a-7: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ba //
T02D3106:200a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub phyir //
T02D3106:200a-9: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis lang //
T02D3106:200a-10: dril bu ldog pa'i tshad ldan la //
T02D3106:200a-11: don yod grub par byas nas ni //
T02D3106:200a-12: lag pa g-yon sbyin sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3106:200a-13: aom aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya //
T02D3106:200a-14: 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ;
T02D3106:200a-15: / shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D3106:200a-16: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D3106:200a-17: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02D3106:200a-18: de tshe dril bu sgra sgrogs te //
T02D3106:200a-19: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02D3106:200a-20: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D3106:200a-21: mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D3106:200a-22: kha cig ming dang phyir mi ldog / dbang yang sbyin par byed pa yod //
T02D3106:200a-23: de ni thun mong dbang yin no //
T02D3106:200a-24: khyad par dbang bskur bstan pa ni //
T02D3106:200a-25: gzungs dang 'khor lo phyag mtshan dang //
T02D3106:200a-26: legs ldan dbang dang bkra shis kyi //
T02D3106:200a-27: rdzas dang rin chen nya rin chen //
T02D3106:200a-28: seng ge mda' gzhu ral gri dang //
T02D3106:200a-29: mthun par sku yi dbang yang bskur //
T02D3106:200a-30: de nas bya ba bsrung bya ba dang //
T02D3106:200a-31: mtshon gyis bra ba dang srung skud gdags //
T02D3106:200a-32: phur bus gdab dang bzlas pa yi //
T02D3106:200a-33: snang ba bzhin dang srung 'khor gyi //
T02D3106:200a-34: cho gas legs par gdags par bya //
T02D3106:200a-35: mchod byas lha rnams gshegs bya ste /
T02D3106:200a-36: brab pa'i lhag ma chu bor dor //
T02D3106:200a-37: rnam lngas thig dbyi la sogs bya //
T02D3106:200a-38: rang gis legs par rtogs pa yi //
T02D3106:200a-40: bla ma'i drin gyis byung ba ste //
T02D3106:200a-41: bsdus byas rgyas pa ma yin pas //
T02D3106:200a-42: mkhas rnams lha la bzod par bya //
T02D3106:200a-43: de las byung ba'i dge tshogs zla ba'i 'od ltar bsil ba des //
T02D3106:200a-44: myos byed skye bo'i tshogs rnams gdung ba bsil bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D3106:200a-45: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mo nyid dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D3106:200a-46: slob mnga' rtogs gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das gtsug
T02D3106:200b-0: tor gdugs dkar mo can gyi @200b dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3106:200b-1: cho ga / slob dpon mkhas pa padma'i lcags kyus
